name: Can I haz 1Karrot
description:
JS1k entry, ranked #7!

Use arrow keys to move. Find the carrot for a surprise!

Optimized for Windows and Mac.

Linux users need to download and install Emoji One as a system font.

Making-of: http://xem.github.io/articles/#js1k2017 (scroll a little)

Entry on JS1k: http://js1k.com/2017-magic/demo/2794

Github: https://github.com/xem/1karrot
